title: Data Scientist
text: We are looking for a Data Scientist with strong programming skills in Python and experience with machine learning algorithms. The ideal candidate should have a Master's degree in Computer Science or related field and 2+ years of experience in data analysis and visualization. Familiarity with tools like TensorFlow and PyTorch is a plus.

title: Software Engineer
text: We are hiring a Software Engineer proficient in Java and Spring framework. The candidate should have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and 3+ years of experience in software development. Experience with microservices architecture and cloud platforms like AWS is highly desired.

title: Marketing Manager
text: We are seeking a Marketing Manager with proven experience in digital marketing campaigns and social media management. The candidate should have excellent communication skills and a Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field. Experience with SEO and Google Analytics is preferred.

title: Product Manager
text: We are searching for a Product Manager to lead product development initiatives. The ideal candidate should have a Bachelor's degree in Business or related field and 5+ years of experience in product management. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills are required.

title: Data Engineer
text: We are looking for a Data Engineer to design and implement data pipelines. The candidate should have expertise in SQL, ETL processes, and data warehousing solutions. Experience with big data technologies like Hadoop and Spark is a plus.
